title: Fundamentals of Machine Learning-Based TRIP/TWIP Titanium Alloy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of introductory metallurgy and statistical concepts, and awareness of simple machine learning models
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education using smartphone-based VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can predict tensile strength (UTS) with over 90% accuracy using an XGBoost model with alloy composition data as input.
Learners can reproduce the hyperparameter optimization process based on the Tree-structured Parzen Estimator (TPE) algorithm using simulation tools.
Learners can explain the correlation between TRIP/TWIP mechanisms and mechanical properties through mathematical modeling.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
